name: farmhouse
chn: n. 农场住宅, 农舍
example_en: The old farmhouse was surrounded by fields of golden wheat.
example_cn: 那座古老的农舍被金色的麦田环绕。
word_family: farm(n) 农场 ,house(n) 房屋 ,farmland(n) 农田 ,farmstead(n) 农庄
memory_tips: 单词“farmhouse”是由“farm”和“house”组合而成的复合词。“Farm”源自古英语中的“feorm”，意思是“食物、供应”，而“house”源自古英语中的“hūs”，意思是“住所、庇护所”。

image_prompts.main_image: A quaint, red-roofed farmhouse with a large barn nearby, surrounded by green fields and a few cows grazing. The scene is peaceful and idyllic, with a clear blue sky overhead.
image_prompts.example_image: An old, weathered farmhouse surrounded by fields of golden wheat, with a few trees in the background. The sun is setting, casting a warm glow over the scene.

collocations: farmhouse kitchen (农舍式厨房); farmhouse cheese (农家奶酪); renovated farmhouse (翻新农村住宅)
